description: This Request for Proposal (RFP) aims to establish a contract for the procurement, fabrication and delivery of 600 brass plated spear point finials complete with a screw hole and brass screw for Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC). The requirement is located in the National Capital Region (NCR).
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Brief Description

The Government of Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) 10079554-A for the procurement, fabrication, and delivery of 600 brass plated spear point finials. The requirement is situated in the National Capital Region (NCR), Canada.

### Highlights

* **Number ofщаughterattes:** 600
* **Material Specification:** Brass plated
* **Finial Type:** Spear point with a screw hole and brass screw
* **Public Works and Government Services Canada** is the intended end-user.

### Tender Details

| Criteria | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | 10079554-A |
| Publication Date | November 22, 2024 |
| Tender Closing Date | December 6, 2024 (14:00 EST) |
| Expected Contract Start Date | December 16, 2024 |
| Expected Contract End Date | April 30, 2025 |

### Procurement Method

This tender is open to all interested suppliers. The lowest price will be the determining factor for contract award.

### Contact Information

For more information and tender documentation, please contact:

* **Myriam Dupuis**
* Phone: (873) 455-5209
* Email: [myriam.dupuis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:myriam.dupuis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Related Documents

Visit the following links to access the tender notice and related documents:

* [English Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52517/solicitation-10079554-a_en.pdf)
* [French Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52517/sollicitation-10079554-a_fr.pdf)
* [Tender Description (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52517/10079554---npp-%28en.pdf)
* [Tender Description (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52517/10079554---apm-%28fr.pdf)
